Yakub ma ọ bụ Yaqub (Arabic: يعقوب, romanized: Ya'qub ma ọ bụ Ya'kọb, nke a sụgharịrị n'ụzọ ndị ọzọ) bụ aha nwoke nyere aha.  Ọ bụ nsụgharị Arabic nke Jekọb na James.  Ụdị Arabic Ya'qub/Ya'kọb nwere ike isi na Hibru ma ọ bụ na-apụtaghị ìhè site na Syriac.  A na-eji aha ahụ na Arabia tupu Islam ma bụrụkwa aha a na-akpọkarị na obodo Arab, Turkish na ndị Alakụba.  A na-ejikwa ya dị ka aha nna.  Ọ na-adịkarị n'asụsụ Polish, Czech na Slovak, ebe a sụgharịrị ya ka Jakub.
